original_text: When they had assembled their fellow Levites and consecrated themselves, they went in to purify the temple of the Lord, as the king had ordered, following the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 그들이 그들의 형제들을 모아 성결하게 하고 들어가서 왕이 여호와의 말씀대로 명령한 것을 따라 여호와의 전을 깨끗하게 할새

sentences.original_text: When they had assembled their fellow Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 동료 레위 사람들을 모았을 때

sentences.original_text: they went in to purify the temple of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주의 성전을 정결케 하기 위해 들어갔으며

sentences.original_text: following the word of the Lord
